title: Rush version-policies.json config file
description: For use with the Rush tool, this file defines version policies. See http://rushjs.io for details.

policyName.description: The name of the version policy

dependencies.description: Behavior when handling package dependencies during version bumps and publishing

versionFormatForPublish.description: The version to use for dependencies when publishing

versionFormatForCommit.description: The version to use for dependencies when committing to source

definitionName.description: The name of version policy definition

version.description: Current version for projects with lockStepVersion policy

mainProject.description: The main project for this version policy

exemptFromRushChange.description: If true, the version policy will not require changelog files.

includeEmailInChangeFile.description: If true, the generated changelog files will include the author's email address.
